R

readFile(String) - Method in class Public
method readFile This method is to read all the information in file
remove() - Method in class DelPanel
method remove This method is to remove the selected route from the file So that when get the information and simulation the information can be updated
removePanel() - Method in class DelPanel
method removePanel This method is create a GUI and the manage could input the route he or she want to delete
removeRoute() - Method in class DelPanel
method removeRoute This method is to remove the selected route from the file and restore the driver and train's status So that when get the information and simulation the information can be updated
rmDriver(String[]) - Method in class DelPanel
method rmDriver This method is to remove the driver which is to restore the driver's status to "true" when the route changes or be deleted The drivers' information is stored in the file so the operation is to chang the content of the file
rmTrain(String[]) - Method in class DelPanel
method rmTrain This method is to remove the train which is to restore the train status to "true" when the route changes or be deleted The trains' information is stored in the file so the operation is to chang the content of the file
Route - Class in <Unnamed>
This is Group033's Software Engineering Coursework.
Route() - Constructor for class Route
constructor Route This constructor is to create a Route contained name, station number, train number and etc
routePanel() - Method in class Route
method routePanel This method is to form a panel which manager can input the number of stations and trains
run() - Method in class Route
method run This method uses Multi-thread to simulate the run of the system and trains, the method is run per second
